name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt Live Wallpaper

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Step into the world of Geralt of Rivia with this stunning live wallpaper extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Step into the world of Geralt of Rivia with this stunning live wallpaper extension. Featuring dynamic scenes from The Witcher 3, it transforms your Chrome browser into a magical experience. With customizable features like real-time date and time, quick links to your favorite websites, and integrated Google search, it combines the excitement of The Witcher universe with everyday browsing convenience.

This extension brings a piece of the Wild Hunt right to your screen. Enjoy seamless access to popular websites with one-click shortcuts, while keeping track of the time and date without leaving your browser. The vibrant and immersive backgrounds from The Witcher 3 keep you engaged, making every browsing session feel like a new adventure. Whether you're looking to quickly search on Google or just admire the breathtaking artwork, this live wallpaper enhances your experience with every use. Donâ€™t just browse, live the fantasy!
